italki call to action: Get a free Russian lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_rus
Get a free Hebrew lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_heb
Demographics: 137,000,000 in Russian Federation (2010 census). Population total all countries: 167,332,230.
4,850,000 in Israel (1998). Spoken by all Israelis as L1 or L2. Some who use it as L1 now in Israel learned it as L2 originally. Population total all countries: 5,302,770.
